(3135x729+665)/64 mod 128 = 8. (3135x729+665)/128 mod 64 = 4. (3135x729+665)/256 mod 32 = 2. (3135x729+665)/512 mod 16 = 1. (3135x2187+2507)/1024 mod 8 = 2. (3135x2187+2507)/2048 mod 4 = 1. (3135x6561+9569)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (3135x6561+9569)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
